body: There is more than one way to say a lot of things. That's what happens when you have a complex language. Saying something is already on the site is just as good as saying "repost". And is actually proper English, unlike the latter.
@benburnetts He just said this was already on the site and you replied to him in a rude way you dumbass.
This is not a repost the last two chapters are new.
@Ten12: That is called repost. How long have you been on the internet, dumbass?
This is already on this site
